remarks.para:
This class initializes the Tingen configuration settings, which define the core functionality of Tingen web service.
The only configuration settings that are not related to core functionality are the Module mode settings, which are store here While Module mode settings are stored in the configuration file, the full configuration settings are stored in the Tingen.config file.
Are specific to Tingen core functionality
Do not change between Tingen sessions
Can be modified by the user to suit their environment
Are stored in "TingenData\%SystemCode%\Config\Tingen.config"
Please see the Tingen documentation for more information.
